fontSize.hint: The size the fonts are rendered. It scales with the grid size to simulate Foundry's own font size scaling, getting bigger on a 200px grid size and smaller on a 50px grid size canvas.

hover.name: Hover Transparency
hover.hint: The transparency of the tooltip when not hovering over a token.

scaleToGridSize.name: Scale to Grid Size
scaleToGridSize.hint: Scales tooltips to the grid size, assuming 100px as the baseline.
